commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four. Keep your arms up.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: O-Okay!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four. Looking good. Keep it up.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Got it!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I was the one who recommended Ayumu, so this may be strange for me to say, but...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I have caused disappointment again. Everyone was practicing with all of their might for the club introductions live show, but now Ayumu is the only one who can perform.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko, have you looked at everyone's faces? I don't think anyone's disappointed.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Okay, that's enough. Let's take a ten-minute break.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Pant* *Pant*

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I know you're still catching your breath, but make sure to stay hydrated. Here, drink up.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thank you. *Pant* *Pant*

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You should wipe off your sweat, too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thank you, Rina.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I have honeyed lemon slices. Do you want some? It's important to get your amino acids.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sure, I'll have one then. Thank you.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ayumu, Kasumi, and I will be in charge of your costume for this performance!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm the one making it, so it'll be suuuper cute. Please look forward to it! I'll do whatever I can to support you!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Kasukasu, I know you think of Ayumu as a rival, so I'm really surprised.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey! I think you need to take a closer look, because I'm not the kind of person you think I am.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Are you saying there's more than meets the Ai? Eye had no eye-dea! *Laugh*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That isn't funny. Also, don't call me Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Thank you all so much for giving me this opportunity. I'll work extra, extra hard!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I can't wait to see you in action. Don't push yourself too hard, though, okay? It's easy to injure yourself if you overdo it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, if that happens, I can take your place!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So you ARE aiming for her spot!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: N-No, I'm not! I just thought Ayumu would have peace of mind and really be able to go all out if she knew she had a stand-in just in case of an emergency.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sure, sure, we believe you.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, I'm telling the truth!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Laugh* Sorry, sorry.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Please don't tease me!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* If anything happens, I'll be counting on you, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Leave it to me!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: No, no, I'll be the one to perform if that time comes. I will use my charms to captivate those prospective students.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: If that's what it's about, I can share my love for school idols and tell the students how wonderful school idols are.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I love school idols just as much as you do.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* We're having the same argument as before.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh, look at that. Well, unfortunately, this isn't our time to shine. Ayumu will see this through for us from start to finish.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, that's right.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yep, especially since I have all this support from you all. It'll definitely go great!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We'll be counting on you!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh, I know! I'll bring you my favorite body pillow tomorrow so you can sleep really well at night. Um, so this pillow is...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: See? Do they seem sad and disappointed to you?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Perhaps they're just trying not to appear that way on the surface.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You think so?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I think that is often the case. However, not for them... At the very least, I do not think it is possible to fake those smiles.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I do not understand. Everyone other than Ayumu failed, so how can they happily help out like that? Don't they feel disappointed and frustrated?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm sure they're a little disappointed. And even though they're friends, they're also rivals, so I'm sure they feel frustrated as well.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Then...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But they're not going to see this as a failure. I definitely wouldn't, if I were in their place.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: But Ayumu was the only one who got her wish. That is an undeniable fact.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, but there are still things they can be happy about and enjoy.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Even if something seems like a waste of time, that doesn't mean everything about it is useless. That's what it's like when you're a school idol.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: School idols... I still do not understand them.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I mean, you thought they were useless up to now. It won't suddenly all make sense to you. I just hope you feel something when you watch them.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Feel something?
